description:
We can set video.vram by setting hw_video_ram in image properties currently [1], but can't set vgamem. The default vgamem is 16MiB, it's not enough for 4k resolutions in some cases. [2]

[1]: https://github.com/openstack/nova/blob/master/nova/virt/libvirt/driver.py#L4170-L4177
[2]: http://www.ovirt.org/documentation/draft/video-ram/
title: Unable to set vgamem for video

comments.content:
We can set video.vram by setting hw_video_ram in image properties currently [1], but can't set vgamem. The default vgamem is 16MiB, it's not enough for 4k resolutions in some cases.

[1]: https://github.com/openstack/nova/blob/master/nova/virt/libvirt/driver.py#L4170-L4177
